cab.content: (utront Is the P?o$&r$% o? /It BHtannlc Majesty^ Government.)Circulated by the Secretary of State for India.CRET.From Viceroy, 30th April 1918. (Received at India Office, 12.30 pan.)Secret. Weekly report. North-West Frontier quiet. Baluchistan. See separate reports for Mari situation. General military situation unchanged.
